statements: UPDATE financial_data SET amount = 1000.00, merchant_name = 'Example Merchant', is_fraud = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE financial_data SET merchant_name = 'Another Merchant', amount = 750.50, transaction_date = '2022-09-15', is_fraud = FALSE WHERE transaction_id = '987e6543-a21b-34c5-d678-901234987654';
UPDATE financial_data SET amount = 300.50, merchant_name = 'Amazon', is_fraud = true WHERE transaction_id = '1a8dfb6e-581f-45b8-a2b3-dc5a7f2fc365'
UPDATE financial_data SET transaction_date = '2022-05-10', is_fraud = false, amount = 150.75 WHERE merchant_name = 'Walmart'
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 100.50, status = 'completed' WHERE transaction_id = '8da42a26-728c-4c51-af83-843b0f80f981';
UPDATE flagged_transactions SET flagged_by = 'Admin', flag_reason = 'Potential fraud' WHERE flag_id = 'bd97bfb8-6e89-4b13-aa82-9e9ce697ec7d';
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 1500.50, status = 'completed' WHERE transaction_id = '7b3b08f3-e59d-4e51-af1b-7f2a6cef8edb';
UPDATE flagged_transactions SET flagged_by = 'Admin', flag_reason = 'Fraudulent Activity' WHERE flag_id = 'fa849507-3d64-4e7d-8877-8e5c329203d9';
UPDATE financial_transactions SET transaction_amount = 1500.50, transaction_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE transaction_id = 101
UPDATE users SET email = 'new_email@example.com', created_at = '2022-02-20 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 201
UPDATE financial_transactions SET transaction_amount = 500.00, transaction_date = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 12345 AND user_id = 98765;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', created_at = '2022-03-15 11:45:00' WHERE user_id = 98765;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 150.75, is_fraud = false WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE customers SET address = '123 Main Street, Anytown', customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 5678;
UPDATE transactions SET is_fraud = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance + 500.50, last_activity_date = NOW() WHERE customer_id = 2001;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance + 100.50 WHERE account_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', created_at='2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE accounts SET balance=1500.50, account_type='Savings' WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username='john_doe');
